job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions integrating AI into both front-end and back-end systems, which are core components of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership of the entire product implies responsibility for its lifecycle, including deployment and maintenance, aligning with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This task directly describes the process of building web applications, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs)' directly points to working with AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership of the 'entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products' encompasses the lifecycle of a project, including its operational aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of different development aspects to create functional solutions, a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: Translating ideas into fully developed products using full-stack development is a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: develop engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase focuses on the 'learning outcomes and efficiency for students,' indicating an understanding of the business and user needs within the educational context.

soft_skills.phrase: innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
taking ownership of the entire product
Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process

Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 and Claude to build AI-powered applications, which is the core of the GenAI Engineer profile. The emphasis on integrating these AI capabilities into user-facing systems and taking ownership of the full product lifecycle further solidifies this classification.
